Package drEventHandling

Class SimpleDREventHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • drEventHandling.SimpleDREventHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DREventHandler

    public class SimpleDREventHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements DREventHandler
    This class is used as the DREventHandler component of the current implementation of the simulation framework. It implements the DREventHandler interface.
    Author:
    nilsw

    • Method Detail

      • getMaximumPossiblePowerDemandFlexibility

        public double getMaximumPossiblePowerDemandFlexibility​(ReserveProvisionType adjustmentType,
                                                       int DRIntervalLength,
                                                       double compensationReward,
                                                       PowerType powerType)
        Description copied from interface: DREventHandler
        Determines the maximum reachable power demand flexibility.
        Specified by:
        getMaximumPossiblePowerDemandFlexibility in interface DREventHandler
        Parameters:
        adjustmentType - Value of ReserveProvisionType that indicates the adjustment type for which the maximum possible power demand flexiblity is requested.
        DRIntervalLength - Length of the received DR event window.
        compensationReward - Financial compensation that is received for the participation in the DR event.
        powerType - Indicates the power type in which the returned maximum possible demand flexiblity is quantified.
        Returns:
        Maximum possible demand flexibility expressed as a power value.

      • issueDemandResponseRequest

        public SchedulingResult issueDemandResponseRequest​(double powerAdjustmentHeight,
                                                   ReserveProvisionType adjustmentType,
                                                   int DRIntervalLength,
                                                   double financialCompensation)
        Description copied from interface: DREventHandler
        Issues a DR request to the DC to which the DREventHandler component belongs.
        Specified by:
        issueDemandResponseRequest in interface DREventHandler
        Parameters:
        powerAdjustmentHeight - Indicates the amount of requested power demand flexibility.
        adjustmentType - Value of ReserveProvisionType that indicates the adjustment type for which the maximum possible power demand flexiblity is requested.
        DRIntervalLength - Length of the received DR event window.
        financialCompensation - Financial compensation that is received for the participation in the DR event.
        Returns:
        Instance of SchedulingResult that indicates the result of a call that was made to the scheduler to schedule the DR event window.

      • optimizePowerDemandFlexibilityCost

        public double[] optimizePowerDemandFlexibilityCost​(double powerAdjustmentHeight,
                                                   ReserveProvisionType adjustmentType,
                                                   int DRIntervalLength,
                                                   double compensationReward)

      • determinePowerDemandFlexibilityCost

        public double determinePowerDemandFlexibilityCost​(double powerAdjustmentHeight,
                                                  ReserveProvisionType adjustmentType,
                                                  int DRIntervalLength,
                                                  double compensationReward,
                                                  double shiftingFraction,
                                                  double DVFSFraction,
                                                  DC drDC)
        Description copied from interface: DREventHandler
        Determines the additional costs that are caused by the provision of power demand flexibility.
        Specified by:
        determinePowerDemandFlexibilityCost in interface DREventHandler
        Parameters:
        powerAdjustmentHeight - Indicates the amount of requested power demand flexibility.
        adjustmentType - Indicates the type of the requested power demand flexibility.
        DRIntervalLength - Specifies the length of the DR event window.
        compensationReward - Defines the height of the financial compensation that is received for the provision of power demand flexiblity.
        shiftingFraction - Indicates the shifting fraction that should be used for the scheduling of the DR event window.
        DVFSFraction - Indicates the scaling frequency that should be used for the scheduling of the DR event window.
        drDC - Specifies an instance of DC that corresponds to a DC for which the adjusted schedule is already set. Can be empty, in that case this will be constructed by the method itself.
        Returns:
        Costs of the power demand flexibility provision with the current configuration

      • setDCScheduler

        public void setDCScheduler​(Scheduler nScheduler)
        Description copied from interface: DREventHandler
        Sets the scheduler variable within the DREventHandler component.
        Specified by:
        setDCScheduler in interface DREventHandler
        Parameters:
        nScheduler - Instance of Scheduler that corresponds to the scheduler component of the DC to which the DREventHandler component belongs.

      • setShiftingFraction

        public void setShiftingFraction​(double shiftingFraction)
        Sets the configured shifting fraction in the scheduler component of the DC to which this DREventHandler belongs.
        Parameters:
        shiftingFraction - Shifting fraction to set.

      • getShiftingFraction

        public double getShiftingFraction​()
        Returns:
        Shifting fraction that is currently configured in the scheduler component of the DC to which this DREventHandler belongs.

        Parameters:
        scalingFrequency - Scaling frequency to set.

      • getScalingFrequency

        public double getScalingFrequency​()
        Returns:
        Scaling frequency that is currently configured in the scheduler component of the DC to which this DREventHandler belongs.

      • setPreviouslyShiftedNodeSteps

        public void setPreviouslyShiftedNodeSteps​(int shiftedNodeSteps)
        Sets the amount of previously shifted node steps in the scheduler component of the DC to which this DREventHandler belongs.
        Parameters:
        shiftedNodeSteps - Amount of shifted nodes steps to set.

      • determineMaximumPowerDemandFlexibility

        private double determineMaximumPowerDemandFlexibility​(ReserveProvisionType adjustmentType,
                                                      int DRIntervalLength,
                                                      PowerType powerType)

      • determineJobEnergyCostUnderDREventImpact

        private double determineJobEnergyCostUnderDREventImpact​(BatchJob job,
                                                        double energyPrice,
                                                        int DREventLength,
                                                        double frequencyAfterDREvent,
                                                        int currentTime)
        Determines the additional energy costs that a specific run configuration during a DR event causes.
        Parameters:
        job - Job for which the additional energy costs are calculated.
        energyPrice - Energy price that is used to calculate the additional costs.
        DREventLength - Length of the considered DR event in simulation time.
        frequencyAfterDREvent - Execution frequency of the job after the DR event.
        currentTime - Start of the DR event in simulation time.
        Returns:
        Additional energy costs that are caused by a specific run configuration during a DR event (the run configuration for the DR event has to be currently specified in the BatchJob instance).

      • determineMaximumPowerDemandFlexibilityShiftingOnly

        private double determineMaximumPowerDemandFlexibilityShiftingOnly​(ReserveProvisionType adjustmentType,
                                                                  int DRIntervalLength,
                                                                  PowerType powerType)

                                                              PowerType powerType)
